__e: I've done my best to stay on top of things but Caleb's financial troubles have left a huge hole in the company.
Is this about your brother's financial problems?
People have money problems the same way that I do, so...
You know what? I don't need financial counsel from a trust-fund brat.
These... financial problems that you're talking about, did... did they have anything to do with Dad?
You don't want to jump into something that might solve all your financial problems in one fell swoop.
Well, I know you were having money problems, and I know Dan didn't help you out.
And when you walk out that door, you lose my protection... both financial... and otherwise.
He told me about your financial troubles, and I have a friend in the business, wonderful man.
